name: dwp-hours-tracker
description: A Node.js application for tracking monthly hours worked and managing Paid Time Off (PTO) for employees.

scripts.worktree:port//: show the port assigned to current worktree
scripts.build//: build client and server in parallel
scripts.build:client//: build client js and assets in parallel
scripts.build:client:js//: bundle client app.ts to public/app.js with esbuild
scripts.build:client:js:watch//: bundle client app.ts to public/app.js with esbuild in watch mode
scripts.build:client:assets: cp client/index.html client/styles.css client/tokens.css client/test.html public/ && cp -r client/components public/ && find public/components -name '*.ts' -type f -delete
scripts.build:client:assets//: copy client files to public directory
scripts.build:test-assets: cp -r client/components public/ && cp client/test.html public/
scripts.build:test-assets//: copy client components and test.html to public
scripts.build:server//: bundle server to dist/server.mjs with esbuild
scripts.build:server:watch//: bundle server to dist/server.mjs with esbuild in watch mode
scripts.dev: npm-run-all -p build:client build:server build:client:js:watch build:server:watch start:prod start:browser
scripts.dev//: start development server with client build in watch mode, auto-restart on server file changes
scripts.server:reload//: reload the server's database from disk
scripts.start:prod//: start production server from built dist/server.mjs
scripts.start:nodemon//: start development server with nodemon for auto-restart on server file changes
scripts.pm2:logs//: show pm2 logs for the app
scripts.db:init//: echo database initialized by server startup
scripts.feature:start//: interactively create a new feature branch from the appropriate planet
scripts.feature:finish//: merge the current feature branch back to its source planet
scripts.feature:migrate//: move features between planets with cherry-pick and branch recreation
scripts.feature:validate//: check branch naming and planet fit for current feature
scripts.planet:promote//: merge a planet branch into main with validation and rebase
scripts.workflow:status//: show current workflow position and branch status
scripts.branch:cleanup//: remove merged feature branches with --force option and logging
scripts.merge:earth//: squash merge earth branch into current branch (planet-aware)
scripts.merge:mars//: squash merge mars branch into current branch (planet-aware)
scripts.git:status//: show concise git status (legacy - use workflow:status for planet workflow)
scripts.git:log//: show recent commits in oneline format
scripts.git:graph//: show recent commits with graph visualization
scripts.git:pull//: pull and rebase from origin main
scripts.git:merge:main: git fetch origin && git merge origin/main
scripts.git:merge:main//: merge latest main into current branch (safe for shared branches)
scripts.git:commit//: stage all changes and commit (opens editor for message)
scripts.git:branch:list//: list all local and remote branches
scripts.git:branch:clean: git branch -d $(git branch --merged | grep -v -E "(main|mercury|mars|earth|saturn|jupiter|\*)" | xargs) 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.git:branch:clean//: delete merged local branches (legacy - use branch:cleanup for planet workflow)
scripts.test:unit:date-fns:tz//: run shared/date-fns facade tests under multiple TZ values
scripts.playwright:seed: pnpm run seed && pnpm run server:reload
scripts.playwright:seed//: seed database and reload server for playwright tests
scripts.test:e2e: export PORT=$(./scripts/set-port.sh) && npm-run-all lint build seed playwright:test
scripts.test: export PORT=$(./scripts/set-port.sh) && npm-run-all lint build seed test:unit playwright:test
scripts.test//: run lint, build, seed, unit tests, then e2e tests with database reset
scripts.lint: npm-run-all -s lint:server lint:client lint:test lint:e2e lint:css lint:script lint:yaml lint:json lint:markdown
scripts.lint//: run all linting tasks in parallel
scripts.lint:json//: check JSON file formatting and syntax
scripts.lint:markdown//: lint all markdown files in the project
scripts.dev:external//: start frontend dev server (static file server) on PORT
scripts.dev:worktree//: start dev server with worktree-specific port
